name: Rio De Janeiro Poster
description: Rio De Janeiro Poster - Christ the Redeemer The iconic Cristo do Redentor statue is known throughout the world. Sitting atop Morro do Corocovado, he keeps a watchful eye on the Cariocas as they go about their daily lives in Rio de Janeiro. - Silk screen print   - 420 x 592mm (A2 size) - Signed and numbered edition of 40   - Printed on 270gsm Colorplan stock All posters are delivered unframed. For more information about this please read our framing page Please note, as the posters are screenprinted there is a small (10mm) border around the print which is blank. This can be hidden by adding a mount board when framing as shown in the product photo.

name: Great Americans greeting cards
description:
The Great Americans edition of cards from RemiCoco. This edition is comprised of 3 cards, each featuring quotes from Thomas Edison, John F. Kennedy and Ernest Hemingway.

You don't even need to send these cards to anyone, just pin them up in your office or kitchen to give you a daily dose of the words behind some of America's greats.

Copy reads:

Edison
"I have not failed, I've just found 10,000 ways that don't work"

Hemingway
"Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut."

Kennedy
"A man may die, nations may rise and fall, but an idea lives on."

Cards are printed on FSC certified stock. Satin coated on the outside and uncoated inside. These cards are not screen printed.

Cards are delivered a pack of three with accompanying white envelopes.
